item.title: Raspberry pi
item.description: Today , I have tried to set up a server on my raspberry pi. I have been wanting to try setting up a some servers for year now. However have been trying too afraid of experiment in the past. So today I tried to set a media server. Issues: Media on the USB - After using docker-compose , i was not see my media. Fix : After mounting the device. Docker is having a hard time, seeing media.
